# Swipe.Photo

Swipe.Photo is a specialized tool for iPhone users to quickly clean and declutter their camera rolls. It uses a simple swipe-to-keep or swipe-to-delete interface to help users manage their photo storage efficiently.

## Core Features
- Quick photo decluttering via swiping gestures.
- Designed specifically for iPhone camera roll management.
- Focuses on privacy and speed.

## Navigation
- [Home](https://swipe.photo/) - Main landing page and app overview.
- [Blog](https://swipe.photo/blog) - Tips on photo organization and iPhone storage management.
- [Work](https://swipe.photo/work) - Showcasing the design and development process.
- [Store](https://swipe.photo/store) - Digital products related to photography and organization.
- [Team](https://swipe.photo/team) - The people behind Swipe.Photo.

## Key Content
- [How to free up iPhone storage](https://swipe.photo/blog/posts/how-to-free-up-iphone-storage)
- [How to declutter iPhone photos](https://swipe.photo/blog/posts/how-to-declutter-iphone-photos)
